amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the language in the bill that raises the Conforming Loan Limit for certain areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-254 to strike the language in the bill that raises the Conforming Loan Limit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 57 - 358 (Roll no. 545).
